text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: In the Land of Snows, that special realm where Padmapāṇi,
text.en-trans: nyingjé terchen chak na pemo yi

text.en: Compassion’s boundless treasure, trains disciples,
text.en-trans: duljé zhing chok gangri jong diru

text.en: You were cared for by Padmasambhava, in his incomparable kindness.
text.en-trans: kadrin dadral pema sam bhavé

text.en: Great siddha, yogi of space—
text.en-trans: jezung drubchen namkhé naljorpa

text.en: Dorje Dudjom, at your feet I pray:
text.en-trans: dorjé düjom zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me so that all clinging to this life’s eight concerns naturally falls away,
text.en-trans: chö gyé tsé di zhenpa rangdrol né

text.en: And my practice continues for as long as I shall live.
text.en-trans: tsé dang drubpa nyompar jingyi lob

text.en: The magical vajra dance of Dorje Dudjom’s three secrets,
text.en-trans: chok gi sang sum dorjé gyutrul gar

text.en: Protector of beings, who clears the darkness in this age of conflict—
text.en-trans: tsöden dü kyi münsel drowé gön

text.en: Jigme Phuntsok, at your feet I pray:
text.en-trans: jikme püntsok zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me so that all clinging to this life’s eight concerns naturally falls away,
text.en-trans: chö gyé tsé di zhenpa rangdrol né

text.en: And my practice continues for as long as I shall live.
text.en-trans: tsé dang drubpa nyompar jingyi lob

text.en: As the light from Jigme Phuntsok’s wisdom speech immersed you in its rays,
text.en-trans: gang gi sung gi özer pöpa lé

text.en: The lotus of your Dharma understanding blossomed, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zabgyé chö la lodrö dabgya zhé

text.en: And your actions to nurture the teachings and beings became extraordinary—
text.en-trans: ten dror menpé trinlé dzé zangchen

text.en: Sublime one, Sonam Dargye, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: sönam dargyé chok la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me so that all clinging to this life’s eight concerns naturally falls away,
text.en-trans: chö gyé tsé di zhenpa rangdrol né

text.en: And my practice continues for as long as I shall live.
text.en-trans: tsé dang drubpa nyompar jingyi lob

text.en: Through the power of wholesome acts and vastmeritfrom former lives,
text.en-trans: kyé ngönsönamgyachen lek jé tü

text.en: In this life you have made the benefit of beingsspreadandflourishbeyond all limit,
text.en-trans: ten dir dro dön chokmédarzhinggyé

text.en: And mastered the glory of raising Buddha’s teachings higher and higher—
text.en-trans: gyalten gung du dekpé pal ngawa

text.en: Root guru supreme: to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsawé lama chok la solwa deb

text.en: Through the devotion of seeing the guru as buddha in person,
text.en-trans: lama sangye ngö tong mögü kyi

text.en: With total trust, I call out to you, continually, at every turn—
text.en-trans: namkün khyé shé drakpö soldeb na

text.en: Bless me to overcome conditions adverse to the Dharma, every single one,
text.en-trans: chö kyi galkyen malü nyerzhi né

text.en: And in an enchanting, secluded retreat, far from the eight concerns,
text.en-trans: chö gyé dralwé wen trö nyamgawar

text.en: When my life and my practice arrive at their culmination,
text.en-trans: tsé dang drubpa ta ru chin né kyang

text.en: Let all impure, delusory experiences evaporate into space,
text.en-trans: ma dak trulwé nangwa ying su nub

text.en: And as I gain direct realization of dharmakāya, original purity,
text.en-trans: kadak chökü gongpa ngöngyur né

text.en: In the palace of spontaneous perfection, buddha nature,
text.en-trans: lhündrub deshek nyingpö podrang du

text.en: May I seize the stronghold of the primordial state!
text.en-trans: dömé tsensa zinpar jingyi lob
